L7p:value.stringValue: // Cast the payload to a message type
// Not an empty string, or empty and the data type is VARCHAR2 or CLOB
Convert date fields to Date context variables
// Consummer passed an empty value for a NUMBER
// If it is empty and is a number send a NULL
If parameter is a Date parameter, then convert default to a Date context variable
// If there is a default use it
Parameter was not in request and does not have a default. Return error
// Either 1) Empty arg and not a string 2) not existing arg

L7p:value.stringValue: // This is enabled during development. Remove later
// Either a GetResponse operattion (then do nothing)
// Found a response in cache - NOT IMPLEMENTED
// Check list of conditions to run async
// If an asynchronous invocation, first return to the consumer
// Must be explicit in case asynch call failed and led us to here
// Will fail if decision is not async
// If asynchronous, try to invoke asynchronously
// Must be explicit in case asynch call failed and led us to here
// If sync or failed enqueue, Invoke, else silently continue
// If async, handle asynchronously. Otherwise, or if enqueue failed, invoke
// Concurrently: 1) Audit accept, 2) Invoke (sync or async)
// If cached response, handle. Otherwise - invoke
// If partner.operation == invoke, proceed with invocation logic
